product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Stand Up Paddleboard - 11' 6"
long_description: The Bic Sport ACE-TEC 11 ft. 6 in. stand up paddleboard offers width, volume and stability geared towards beginners and larger paddlers. Perfect for cruising on flatwater and charging light surf, the Bic Sport ACE-TEC 11 ft. 6 in. board combines durability and performance to create a great multipurpose board. Perfect for large paddlers, the 11 ft. 6 in. length handles nicely and tracks well in flatwater. The 11 ft. 6 in. length is also a great choice for multiple users-high stability means everyone can have a fun time. Balanced rocker design and longboard-style outline offers excellent handling on flatwater and easy maneuverability in waves and light surf. EPS foam core wrapped with an epoxy resin/fiberglass cloth is encased in a styrene polymer outer shell; construction offers lightweight durability. Multiaxial fiberglass cloth distributes weight in multiple directions in the board, offering excellent stiffness and low weight. Padded deck supplies reliable wax-free traction when paddling in the standing or kneeling position, and it increases comfort on long paddles. 10 in. single fin promotes straight tracking in the water. FCS fin features injection-molded construction and a specialized structure on the inside face of the fin that reduces drag and enhances performance. Integrated carry handle on deck makes toting the 30 lb. the Bic Sport ACE-TEC stand up paddleboard quick and easy. Please note that the color of the deck pad on the tail of the board may be gray and not colored.
short_description: The Bic Sport ACE-TEC 11 ft. 6 in. stand up paddleboard offers width, volume and stability geared towards beginners and larger paddlers.
